AI Description: Tigmint is a software tool that aids in the rearrangement and duplication error correction in genomes assembled with linked-read sequencing technologies such as 10X Genomics.
Core Features: Corrects Errors In Genome Assemblies From Linked-Read Sequencing Technologies, Identifies Misassemblies, Corrects Genome Misassemblies, & Fills Gaps In Assemblies, Efficiently Handles Large & Complex Genomes, Improves The Accuracy & Contiguity Of Genome Assemblies
General Tags: Genome Assembly, Genomics, DNA Sequencing, Linked-Read Sequencing
